title: Phased Implementation Plan
body_html:
Phased Implementation Plan

Phase 1: Foundations

  • Models: WebhookConfig, WebhookEvent, WebhookDeliveryAttempt
  • Basic API: create/list/update/delete, test delivery
  • Trigger: emit events for Issues & Projects
  • Delivery: retry, HMAC signatures, attempts log

Phase 2: Coverage & Filters

  • Expand events (comments, attachments)
  • Add rich filters (project/status/assignee/etc.)
  • Delivery metrics & health endpoints

Phase 3: UX & Operations

  • Admin UI pages in Huly (manage webhooks)
  • Replay failed deliveries
  • Rate limiting and circuit breaker

Phase 4: Migration Tools

  • Dual-run with standalone service
  • Replay window & backfill
  • Cutover plan and rollback
